hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "If I stayed in prison as long as Joseph stayed and then the messenger came, I would respond to his call (to go out of the prison)

chapter.ara-name: باب رُؤْيَا أَهْلِ السُّجُونِ وَالْفَسَادِ وَالشِّرْكِ
chapter.eng-name: The dreams of prisoners, evil-doers and Mushrikun
